sect1.title: NOTHOR NOTHOR function

row.entry: Optional. The identifier for this action.

sect1.para: The NOTHOR compiler directive indicates the action should not execute on thor, but inline instead, in a global context. You can only do very simple dataset operations within a NOTHOR, like filtering records or a simple PROJECT.
NOTHOR needs to be used around operations that use the superfile transactions, (such as the example below) where the compiler does not spot the appropriate context .
